original_text: According to the number that ye shall prepare, so shall ye do to every one according to their number.
korean_text: 너희가 준비하는 수효를 따라 각기 수효에 맞게 하라

sentences.original_text: According to the number that ye shall prepare,
so shall ye do to every one according to their number.
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 너희는 각 사람의 수량에 따라 행해야 합니다.
